snippet: The College Board plans to release many details of its revised test on Wednesday, including sample questions and explanations of the research and goals behind them.
abstract: College Board will release many details of its revised SAT, to be introduced in the spring of 2016, including sample questions and explanations of the research, goals and specifications behind them; one big change is in vocabulary questions, which will no longer include obscure words.
lead_paragraph: The College Board plans to release many details of its revised test on Wednesday, including sample questions and explanations of the research and goals behind them.

headline.main: Revised SAT Won’t Include Obscure Vocabulary Words
headline.print_headline: Revised SAT Won’t Include Obscure Vocabulary Words
